title: The Windows Registry Adventure #5: The regf file format
summary:
Posted by Mateusz Jurczyk, Google Project Zero

As previously mentioned in the second installment of the blog post series ("A brief history of the feature"), the binary format used to encode registry hives from Windows NT 3.
